name: pwa-with-mobile-device-featues
description: A progressive web app with many mobile device features

scripts.minify: uglifyjs public/src/js/app.js -o public/src/js-min/app.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/feed.js -o public/src/js-min/feed.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/idb.js -o public/src/js-min/idb.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/utility.js -o public/src/js-min/utility.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run build-workbox

author: Ashish <ashishkumar.ui@gmail.com>
